subject: Remittance of Gratuity Contribution and other statutory contributions in respect of officers from State/Central PSUs on deputation to NHAI
text: HRay 77ty TTTNf xferarut &H19 / Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 (4em War- 3)_{rTHNf HTT4) Yq7 Fax : 91-11-25093507 25093514 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) vi-5 & 6, #dr-10_ aRa, 7 fert-110075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka; New Delhi-110075 NHAI/Policy Guidelines/ Administration/Establishment & General Instructions /2019 In No. 1.3.2.26/2019, Dated the 27 March, 2019 (Decision taken in File No. 11019/422/2002 / Admn-II) Subject: Remittance of Gratuity Contribution and other statutory contributions in respect of officers from State/Central PSUs on deputation to NHAI With the approval of Competent Authority, it has been decided to withdraw 2 of the Policy Circular No-1.3.2.23/2017 dated 07.06.2017 on the above subject. 270} (V.K.
